MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G84 postcode area of Helensburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am to safely complete repairs on our equipment for properties on East Princes Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:58am on Thursday, 11 February 2021
